attributes.action: Repeal or Amend the Equality Act of 2010
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned urge to government to either repeal or drastically amend this poorly thought out act which has become a burden on British society.

An example would be the bureaucracy that is added when employing people and putting people like pregnant women in front at a job selection process over other people no matter how competent or qualified they may be.
